subtitle: generally speaking when you ask most
Mystics about the best diet what you
hear most often is that the vegetarian
diet is the way to go there are a number
of reasons why this is including that
the human body seems to be designed for
it being far more similar to mammals
that are herbivores than those of
carnivores we don't have pointy teeth
like carnivores do and our intestines
are very long like that of sheep or deer
when compared to the very short
digestive tract of a lion or tiger it
also seems to be the case that eating
meat generally is very heavy in the body
and keeps our energy more rooted in the
lower centers however beyond all of that
the most important thing about the food
that we eat is that we should try and
get it as clean as possible even if
we're eating meat it's better to eat
food that has not been treated with
chemicals or subject to horrible
suffering in life we are what we eat
after all so let us do our best to eat
clean and always be thankful for our
meals
